title: Krowarzywa - Hoza
typeOfFood: Vegan, Organic, Western, Fast food, Juice bar, Take-out
description: A vegan burger joint where the burgers are made of tofu, seitan, millet, chickpeas, and vegetables all served in a bun with sauce of your choice. Uses local and seasonal produce. Serves fair trade coffee and tea, fruit and vegetable juices and cakes and cookies. Est. Mar 2013 at Hoza 42, and moved here in Jan 2016.
